name: Shai Shalev-Shwartz
content: Shai Shalev-Shwartz Shai Shalev-Shwartz The Rachel and Selim Benin School of Computer Science and Engineering The Hebrew University of Jerusalem Rothberg Building, Room B428 Givat Ram, Jerusalem 91904, Israel Email: shais at cs dot huji dot ac dot il Phone: +972 2 54 94565 I am a professor at the School of Computer Science and Engineering at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Israel. I am also the CTO of Mobileye, working on autonomous driving. I received my PhD from the Hebrew University in 2007, and was a research assistant professor at the Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago until June 2009. My work focuses on Machine Learning algorithms. Publications Code Talks Teaching Activities Students My book: See related lecture notes and videos MagidForYou app
